description: Return a list of the components of input_string when split using the specified delimiter. If strip_whitespace is not specified or is "True", strip all whitespace from the beginning and end of each resulting component.

inputs.description: The delimiter to split by, which defaults to a comma
inputs.name: delimiter

inputs.description: Either True or False to indicate whether or not to remove whitespace before and after each item. Defaults to True
inputs.name: strip_whitespace

outputs.description: One result for each output item
List of items as a string. Example ["item1", "item2"]
